Favorite Restaurant

Background

It's always difficult to find the best restaurant to go to for a group of friends. We will build a solution that chooses the ideal restaurant given the friend's preferences.

What to Build

For each strategy below write a function that determines the results given a hash of friend's names with three preferred restaurants each.

  • Strategy 1 - Return the most commonly occurring restaurant
  • Strategy 2 - Return the top two most commonly occurring options for further consideration
  • Strategy 3 - Return the winning restaurant with consideration of their ranked order in the input. First selection gets 3 points, next is 2 points, last is 1 point.

Files

  • index.html - Contains these instructions.
  • src/favoriteRestaurant.js - Write your solution here.
  • spec/favoriteRestaurant.spec.js - Contains example data and test cases.

Test Output

To see the output from the test open the 'Test' tab above.
